metadata.name: Culture and Identity
metadata.description: We can draw inspiration from horses as we once did before the invention of cars: we can learn tenacity and courage in the face of harsh conditions while we move on. Horses are a key part of the culture of the people of Northen Nigeria, each horses with beautiful attires has its own symbolism and what it stands for and it is a symbol of royalty in most African cultural settings. it was born of a beautiful, multifaceted entity which gives strength, identity and purpose to its people.
